snippet: The authorities say that Daniel Fernandez, 16, was traveling to a birthday party when the accident happened near the George Washington Bridge on Friday night.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say that Daniel Fernandez, 16, was traveling to a birthday party when the accident happened near the George Washington Bridge on Friday night.
